==Generate deployable service artifacts for VP 1.3.x==

*Description*

A script to generate deployable jar files for the Virtualized Platform (VP 1.3.x).

*Prerequisites*

Java is installed and JAVA_HOME is set in environment.

Requires [http://groovy.codehaus.org/ groovy] 1.8.2 or newer. [http://groovy.codehaus.org/Installing+Groovy See groovy installation instructions]

You need to install Maven service archetype in order to run the script

 # cd `/skltpservices/tools/generators/archetypes/trunk/ServiceArchetype`
 # mvn install

Script is based on the [http://rivta.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/specs/RIV_Tekniska_Anvisningar_Konfigurationsstyrning.pdf RIV TA Konfigurationsstyrning 1.0]

*To create service virtualizations*

 # Download RIV TA zip with the service contracts and unzip it, [http://code.google.com/p/rivta/ RIV TA]
 # Download [https://code.google.com/p/skltpservices/source/browse/#svn%2Ftools%2Fgenerators%2Fscripts%2Ftrunk%2Fse%2Fskltpservices%2Ftools files needed for running] 
 # Update pomtemplate.xml with correct groupid, artifactid and version depending on what domain/subdomain is used and what version of RIV TA contract is used, see sample below
{{{
  <groupId>se.skl.skltpservices</groupId>
  <artifactId>itintegration-engagementindex</artifactId>
  <version>1-RC4</version>
}}}
 # Run script with schemas as input
{{{ 
 $./VirtualiseringGenerator.groovy <path to unzipped RIV TA file, schemas folder> 
}}}
 # Folders for each interaction has now been created, each containing a definition of a virtual service.
{{{
  FindContent
     pom.xml
     Virtualisering
       pom.xml
       src
          main
             resources
                schemas
                  core_components
                  interactions 
                tp-virtuell-tjanst-config.xml
  GetUpdates
  ProcessNotification
  Update
  pom.xml
}}}
